name: Contract
title: Contract
description: Legally enforceable, formally recorded unilateral or bilateral directive i.e., a policy or agreement.

elements.name: Contract
elements.description: Legally enforceable, formally recorded unilateral or bilateral directive i.e., a policy or agreement.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Unique identifier for this Contract or a derivative that references a Source Contract.

elements.name: url
elements.description: Canonical identifier for this contract, represented as a URI (globally unique).

elements.name: version
elements.description: An edition identifier used for business purposes to label business significant variants.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the resource instance.

elements.name: legalState
elements.description: Legal states of the formation of a legal instrument, which is a formally executed written document that can be formally attributed to its author, records and formally expresses a legally enforceable act, process, or contractual duty, obligation, or right.

elements.name: instantiatesCanonical
elements.description: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined Contract Definition that is adhered to in whole or part by this Contract.

elements.name: instantiatesUri
elements.description: The URL pointing to an externally maintained definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Contract.

elements.name: contentDerivative
elements.description: The minimal content derived from the basal information source at a specific stage in its lifecycle.

elements.name: issued
elements.description: When this Contract was issued.

elements.name: applies
elements.description: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract is applicable.

elements.name: expirationType
elements.description: Event resulting in discontinuation or termination of this Contract instance by one or more parties to the contract.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The target entity impacted by or of interest to parties to the agreement.

elements.name: authority
elements.description: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people, principals, organizations, or jurisdictions formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action.

elements.name: domain
elements.description: Recognized governance framework or system operating with a circumscribed scope in accordance with specified principles, policies, processes or procedures for managing rights, actions, or behaviors of parties or principals relative to resources.

elements.name: site
elements.description: Sites in which the contract is complied with, exercised, or in force.

elements.name: name
elements.description: A natural language name identifying this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

elements.name: title
elements.description: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

elements.name: subtitle
elements.description: An explanatory or alternate user-friendly title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

elements.name: alias
elements.description: Alternative representation of the title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

elements.name: author
elements.description: The individual or organization that developed the Contract precedent, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

elements.name: scope
elements.description: A selector of legal concerns for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

elements.name: topicCodeableConcept
elements.description: Narrows the range of legal concerns to focus on the achievement of specific contractual objectives.

elements.name: topicReference
elements.description: Narrows the range of legal concerns to focus on the achievement of specific contractual objectives.

elements.name: type
elements.description: A high-level category for the legal instrument, whether constructed as a Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

elements.name: subType
elements.description: Sub-category for the Contract that distinguishes the kinds of systems that would be interested in the Contract within the context of the Contract's scope.

elements.name: contentDefinition
elements.description: Precusory content developed with a focus and intent of supporting the formation a Contract instance, which may be associated with and transformable into a Contract.

elements.name: term
elements.description: One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.

elements.name: supportingInfo
elements.description: Information that may be needed by/relevant to the performer in their execution of this term action.

elements.name: relevantHistory
elements.description: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this Contract definition, derivative, or instance, which identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the Contract.

elements.name: signer
elements.description: Parties with legal standing in the Contract, including the principal parties, the grantor(s) and grantee(s), which are any person or organization bound by the contract.

elements.name: friendly
elements.description: The "patient friendly language" versionof the Contract in whole or in parts.

elements.name: legal
elements.description: List of Legal expressions or representations of this Contract.

elements.name: rule
elements.description: List of Computable Policy Rule Language Representations of this Contract.
